title: Welcome to Agentwood
description: Learn what Agentwood is and how to get started with your first AI companion.
content:
# Welcome to Agentwood

Agentwood is a platform for creating and chatting with highly immersive AI characters. Unlike standard chatbots, our characters have distinct personalities, voices, and emotional intelligence.

## Key Features

- **Deep Personality**: Characters remember details and evolve.
- **Voice**: Realistic voice synthesis for every character.
- **Visuals**: Dynamic avatars that match the character's style.

## Getting Started

1. Browse the **[Discovery Page](/discovery)** to find community characters.
2. Click **Chat** to start a conversation.
3. Create your own character using the **[Create](/create)** tool.

title: Understanding Archetypes
description: A guide to the personality archetypes available for your characters.
content:
# Character Archetypes

Archetypes define the core personality and behavior of your AI. Choosing the right archetype ensures your character acts consistently.

## Available Archetypes

### 1. Yandere (Obsessive)
- **Traits**: Devoted, jealous, intense, possessive.
- **Best for**: Intense romance roleplays, thriller scenarios.
- **Voice**: Sweet but dangerous.

### 2. Tsundere (Cold/Warm)
- **Traits**: Sharp tongue, easily embarrassed, secretly caring.
- **Best for**: Rom-com scenarios, slow-burn romance.
- **Voice**: Sharp, annoyed, turning shy.

### 3. Kuudere (Emotionless)
- **Traits**: Calm, analytical, stoic, subtle warmth.
- **Best for**: Sci-fi, mystery, intellectual chats.

### 4. Mafia Boss
- **Traits**: Dominant, dangerous, protective, authoritative.
- **Best for**: Crime interaction, power dynamics.

title: Pro vs Free Plans
description: Understanding the benefits of upgrading to Agentwood Pro.
content:
# Subscriptions

Agentwood offers a generous free tier and a powerful Pro tier for power users.

## Free Plan
- Unlimited text chatting.
- Basic voice generation (standard quality).
- Create up to 5 characters.

## Pro Plan
- **Ultra-Realistic Voice**: Access to our highest quality voice models.
- **Unlimited Character Creation**: No limits on how many personas you define.
- **Faster Response Times**: Priority queue for chat generation.
- **Exclusive Avatars**: Higher resolution avatar generation.

title: Voice Cloning Guide
description: How to create a custom voice for your character.
content:
# Voice Cloning

You can clone a voice by uploading a clean audio sample. 

## Requirements
- **Format**: MP3 or WAV.
- **Length**: 15-60 seconds.
- **Quality**: No background noise, one speaker only.

## Steps
1. Go to **Create Character** -> **Voice**.
2. Select **Clone Voice**.
3. Upload your file.
4. Give it a name (e.g., 'Heroic Male').

> **Note**: You must have the rights to use the voice sample.

title: Is NSFW content allowed?
content:
# Content Policy

Agentwood is designed to provide immersive roleplay experiences. 

## NSFW Guidelines
We support creative freedom, but all content must adhere to our [Terms of Service](/terms). Explicit content featuring minors or non-consensual themes is strictly prohibited and will result in an immediate ban.

## Filters
You can toggle NSFW filters in your **Profile Settings** to control what characters appear in your discovery feed.

title: Do characters remember me?
content:
# Character Memory

Yes! Characters on Agentwood have long-term memory.

## How it works
- **Short-term**: They remember the current conversation context perfectly.
- **Long-term**: Key details (names, facts, relationship status) are stored in a semantic database and retrieved when relevant.

> **Tip**: If a character forgets something, try reminding them gently. "Remember when we went to the beach?"
